verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w forces|strong="H3898"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w warfare|strong="H6635"\w* \w against|strong="H3898"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w So|strong="H1961"\w* Achish \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w men|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w battle|strong="H6635"\w* \w with|strong="H3898"\w* \w me|strong="H3318"\w*.”

\w David|strong="H1732"\w* replied, “\w Then|strong="H3651"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w come|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.” “\w Very|strong="H3651"\w* \w well|strong="H3045"\w*,” \w said|strong="H3651"\w* Achish. “\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w bodyguard|strong="H8104"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.”

\w Now|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H4191"\w* \w this|strong="H4191"\w* \w time|strong="H3478"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w mourned|strong="H5594"\w* \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* own \w city|strong="H5892"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mediums \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w spiritists|strong="H3049"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w Shunem|strong="H7766"\w*, while \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w*, \w he|strong="H3820"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w trembled|strong="H2729"\w* \w violently|strong="H3966"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w inquired|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H7592"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* Urim \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H1245"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, “\w Find|strong="H1245"\w* \w me|strong="H1875"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman \w who|strong="H5650"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w medium|strong="H1172"\w*, \w so|strong="H5650"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w can|strong="H5650"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w consult|strong="H1875"\w* \w her|strong="H3212"\w*.” “\w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w medium|strong="H1172"\w* \w at|strong="H7586"\w* \w Endor|strong="H5874"\w*,” \w his|strong="H1245"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* replied.

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w disguised|strong="H2664"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w by|strong="H5973"\w* \w putting|strong="H3847"\w* \w on|strong="H3847"\w* different \w clothes|strong="H3847"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w set|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H8147"\w* \w his|strong="H7586"\w* \w men|strong="H8147"\w*. \w They|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* woman \w at|strong="H7586"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* said, “Consult \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spirit \w for|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w*. \w Bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w one|strong="H1931"\w* \w I|strong="H3212"\w* name.”

\w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* woman replied, “\w Surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* mediums \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w spiritists|strong="H3049"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land. \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w set|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trap \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w get|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w killed|strong="H4191"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* her \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*: “\w As|strong="H1697"\w* surely \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w lives|strong="H2416"\w*, no \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7136"\w* \w upon|strong="H7586"\w* \w you|strong="H7136"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*.”

“\w Whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* I \w bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w for|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H4310"\w*?” \w the|strong="H5927"\w* woman asked. “\w Bring|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*,” \w he|strong="H4310"\w* replied.

\w But|strong="H7200"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* woman \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w she|strong="H4100"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H2199"\w* \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* said \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w deceived|strong="H7411"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*? \w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*!”

“\w Do|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*,” \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* replied. “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* god \w coming|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w*,” \w the|strong="H7200"\w* woman answered.

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* look \w like|strong="H5927"\w*?” \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*. “\w An|strong="H3588"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w man|strong="H2205"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w coming|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*,” \w she|strong="H1931"\w* replied. “\w And|strong="H7586"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* wearing \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w robe|strong="H4598"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w and|strong="H7586"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* facedown \w in|strong="H5927"\w* \w reverence|strong="H7812"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w disturbed|strong="H7264"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w bringing|strong="H5927"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* am \w deeply|strong="H7264"\w* \w distressed|strong="H6887"\w*,” \w replied|strong="H6030"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*. “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w fighting|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H5750"\w* \w answers|strong="H6030"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w either|strong="H1571"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*. \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w tell|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.”

“\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w consult|strong="H7592"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*,” \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, “since \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6145"\w*?

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* exactly \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*: \w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w torn|strong="H7167"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w carry|strong="H6213"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w burning|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Moreover|strong="H1571"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w army|strong="H4264"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.”

\w Immediately|strong="H4116"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w flat|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* ground, \w terrified|strong="H3966"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*. \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w gone|strong="H5307"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eaten \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* woman \w came|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w how|strong="H3588"\w* distraught \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H7586"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, “\w Look|strong="H7200"\w*, \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w maidservant|strong="H8198"\w* \w has|strong="H7586"\w* \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w did|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w servant|strong="H8198"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w morsel|strong="H6595"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.”

Saul \w refused|strong="H3985"\w*, \w saying|strong="H6963"\w*, “\w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* eat.” \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w joined|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* woman \w in|strong="H3427"\w* urging \w him|strong="H6963"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w heeded|strong="H8085"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* ground \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3947"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* had \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fattened|strong="H4770"\w* \w calf|strong="H5695"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* she \w quickly|strong="H4116"\w* \w slaughtered|strong="H2076"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*. She also \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w flour|strong="H7058"\w*, \w kneaded|strong="H3888"\w* \w it|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* baked \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*.

\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w served|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* ate. \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w left|strong="H6965"\w*.
